name: The Final Heist
description:
Go to MUP Games

The Final Heist is a twin stick shooter where you impersonate a bank robberer.  The game features fast-paced firefights and a low-poly style with a dark tone.

The game takes place inside a wide american bank, and your goal is to collect and extract as much money as you can.

Steal money, protect yourself from the police officers and don't let the hostages get away. Make the greatest robbery ever!

ATTENTION: if you have a controller connected to your PC and you want to play with mouse & keyboard, be sure to unplug it and then launch the game. At the moment, there is a bug that makes the game with mouse & keyboard unplayable if you have a controller attached.

The Final Heist is a free game made for the graduation project during the Master in Game Development @ Università degli Studi di Verona.

Platform: Windows PC, macOS

Engine: Unity

Language: C#

Team size: 10
